column4: hi i was wondering how to get the wpa working. in the router configuration it says to choose a passphrase, then it says renewal in 3600s. does that mean the passwrd changes everytime and disconnects my wirelesss?

i was wondering how to get the wpa working. in the router configuration it says to choose a passphrase, then it says renewal in 3600s. does that mean the passwrd changes everytime and disconnects my wirelesss?
no, renewal should only be for the dhcp lease (and it will just ask and get the same address again usually)
